body.name: You Have Space 2 Pack Hanging Picture Display Photo Holders with Metal Cable Strings and 40 Magnetic Clips Metal Black

byLineInfo.name: Visit the You Have Space Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 45 mins
features: Stylish Photo Collage: Instead of bulky picture frames use this picture hanging wire to attach your family pictures, polaroids and more. YouHaveSpace wire rod set for hanging pictures optimizes your wall space and creates an aesthetic room decor.

Sturdy and Modern: This picture hanging kit comes with 8 metal wire rope and 2 wide rail along with 40 magnetic clips for photos. Besides being sturdy, its sleek and modern design will create a boho decor on your walls.

Great for Anywhere: Create a hanging display unit in your home, office, kindergarten or anywhere to your liking. Attach pictures, inspirational photos from pinterest, meeting notes, or your kids arts. Cherish the moments and create a modern photo wall decor from your best memories!

Kids Crafts Display: Use YouHaveSpace hanging wire to show off your kids talent! Display your kids painting activities as a part of your nursery decor or kids room decor and enhance their self-esteem.
Easy Mounting: The picture hanging wire comes with all necessary mounting hardware for your convenience. Just follow the instructions and your wall hanging unit will be ready in minutes!
body.description: Always Have Space: Stainless-steel wire rod with picture hanger clips will enable you to change what is attached. Replace your kids old arts, crafts, projects, or drawings with the new ones. Easily take the attached artwork off and put something new on this photo organizer!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Display Your Photos, Polaroids, Kids Crafts and Keep Memories With You At All Times! Display Kids Arts and Crafts: Instead of bulky wall shelves for pictures, use this picture hanging kit to attach your kids drawing, arts and crafts and create a kids room wall decor.

Photo Display: CORDONE picture hanging wire with clips helps you attach your family pictures to build a family tree wall decor. Keep your favourite memories close with these picture hangers while contributing your home decor.

Attach Cooking Recipes: Utilize these wall clips to attach your cooking recipes! Instead of a bulky cookbook stand, use this stainless steel rod and keep your recipes within hands reach and feel like a gourmet cook! Always Have Space: Stainless-steel wire rod with picture hanger clips will enable you to change what is attached. Replace your kids old arts, crafts, projects, or drawings with the new ones. Easily take the attached artwork off and put something new on this photo organizer!

In Your Office CORDONE Picture Hanging Tool Will Help You To: Create a wall collage with your favorite memories, photos, drawings and more without damaging your walls.Keep track of events, achievements, projects and more.
ADJUSTABLE CABLES Material: MetalColor: Black DIMENSIONS Dimensions: Rail W 18” Each Cable H 30” PACKAGE CONTENT 2 Rail8 Cables40 Picture Hanging ClipsMounting Hardware and Installation Hardware

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at first but this looks great now that it’s up and has stuff on it. I wanted a place to display my kids’ work and this works well 👍 Keep in mind you have to use several clips to hold one piece of paper, which was tricky at first but I figured it out. My girls love seeing their work displayed on the wall for all to see! Easy install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and Great Way to Display Pics
reviews.reviewText: Got as a gift to hang photos by decade. In some cases we wanted two polaroid photos per clip so we also ordered from Amazon neodymium magnets 8x1mm to give the clips extra strength for more than a single photo. We also order extra clips which is another way to hang multiple photos (put a clip on top of photo and one on the bottom then secure to hanging wire). These are a fun set of frames for celebrating a special birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this! Looking to declutter the fridge and display the kids art.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value for cost
reviews.reviewText: I searched forever for an easy way to display and swap out the mountains of artwork my toddler brings home from daycare, from frames to wires with hooks and finally settled on this system. It’s easy to install and pretty straightforward in terms of how to display artwork. I knocked off one star because I think the metal wires could be a little thicker to provide more surface area for the magnets on the clip to cling to and vastly improve the product. You have to mess with them a bit to use the right number of clips to hold it up if you have anything heavier than a piece of printer or coloring book paper. Overall, I’m happy with the product and would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are so beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: We have already had lots of compliments on these. My 4 year old daughter loves displaying her art work in our dining room. I'm so happy I made this purchase. These are exactly what I was looking for. I wish they came in brushed nickel to match the rest of our stuff, but I still love them just as they are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST THING TO SHOW OFF LITTLES ART
reviews.reviewText: so my prek daughter is obsessed with drawing and here i am stuffing the drawings in a drawer or trash. Until I stumbled across this masterpiece, once i put it on the wall in the playroom it has been a HIT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome art holder
reviews.reviewText: Was skeptical with how it looked, but it looks wonderful with my child’s artwork. Very sturdy and surprised how many clips it came with. The magnetic attachment is genius. So much better than having to constantly clip it to the paper and then to the hanger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Clips’ magnets fall off easily (see picture) so not only will it not last but dangerous if there are small children in the house that still like to put things in their mouth. Once I clip the pictures they start sliding down since the tiny magnets can’t hold the paper’s weight. I like the aesthetic of it but that doesn't matter if it doesn’t work.
